Info

Defined class ATSLoggerFile with attribute(s) and method(s). Created API for ATS logger file path in one propery object.

class ats_utilities.logging.ats_logger_file.ATSLoggerFile(verbose=False)[source]

Bases: object

Defined class ATSLoggerFile with attribute(s) and method(s). Created API for ATS logger file path in one propery object. It defines:

attributes
__verbose - enable/disable verbose option.
__logger_file - log file path.
methods
__init__ - initial constructor.
logger_file - property methods for set/get operations.
__str__ - dunder method for ATSLoggerFile.
VERBOSE = 'ats_utilities::logging::ats_logger_file'
property logger_file

Property method for getting log file path.

Returns

log file path | None.

Return type

<str> | <NoneType>

Exceptions

None
